Profile

I’m Mattia! Born in Venice, untiring traveler, lifelong learner, passionate about science, technology, and photography. I enjoy my days’ coding, going out in the wild nature to take photos and if snow involved, having fun with my board. I’m often described as a goal-oriented person, highly-skilled team player able to collaborate with other developers and software testers to deliver remarkable products focused on great end-user experience within in mind cost, efficiency, and scalability.

Proficiency

  • UI/UX design, co-design methodologies
  • Test Drive Development (TDD), Extreme Programming (EX)
  • Analysing and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems
  • Implement efficient and complex applications with Angular, Ember, React
  • Maintain a well-organized codebase of components with strong unit tests
  • Think through edge cases and unexpected user interactions to develop a robust UX
  • Tech lead and code review
  • Agile ans SCRUM methodologies
